Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Trump Entrepreneur Institute currently has no rating from the Better Business Bureau.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the rating of the Trump University by stating that they have an "A" from the Better Business Bureau, while the last rating given was a D-minus.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to support the claim of having an "A" rating.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists as the claim contradicts the information provided by the Better Business Bureau, which states that the Trump Entrepreneur Institute is out of business and has no rating.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it fails to acknowledge the D-minus rating given to the Trump University by the Better Business Bureau in 2010.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the rating given to the Trump University by the Better Business Bureau was an "A" without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
